participant_1.background:
I am unemployed and living off a trust fund.
I once lost a diamond at a debutante ball.
I like getting my nails done.
I like drinking expensive wine.

participant_2.background:
I like to go to the opera.
I love to vacation in paris.
My favorite auto is a bentley.
I enjoy classical music.

content.text: Oh, you like to go to the opera? I love it too! I've been to the opera in Paris, it was amazing!
That's awesome! I've been to the opera in Paris too, it's one of my favorite places to go.
Me too! I love the atmosphere, the music, and the people.
I know, it's so magical. I could spend hours there.
Me too! I'm so glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who appreciates the finer things in life.
Definitely! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about opera.
Same here! It's not often that you meet someone who loves it as much as I do.
I know, right? It's such a niche interest.
It is, but that's what makes it so special.
Exactly! It's something that we can bond over.
I agree! I'm so glad we met.
Me too! Maybe we can go to the opera together sometime.
That would be great! I would love that.
